tool_description: Tracks voltage regulation performance by monitoring voltage setpoints, actual voltages, and regulator tap positions across the network.

regulator_id.description: Unique identifier for the voltage regulator

voltage_setpoint.description: Target voltage setpoint in volts (100 to 50000)

measured_voltages.description: Array of measured voltage values in volts

deadband_voltage.description: Voltage regulation deadband in volts (1 to 1000)

error_messages: Invalid regulator ID: Regulator identifier not found in system database.
Voltage setpoint out of range: Must be between 100 and 50000 volts.
Array length mismatch: measured_voltages and tap_positions must have the same length.
Deadband out of range: Must be between 1 and 1000 volts.
Invalid tap position: Tap positions must be integers within valid range.
usage: Specify regulator_id, voltage_setpoint, and arrays of measured_voltages and tap_positions. Optionally set deadband_voltage and monitoring_duration for customized analysis.

average_deviation.description: Average voltage deviation from setpoint in volts

tap_operations.description: Total number of tap change operations

time_in_deadband.description: Percentage of time voltage was within deadband

performance_grade.description: Regulation performance grade: excellent, good, fair, poor
